page.title: 07The School
page.content: The school is old.It doesn't have much space.There is a library up some stairs with a lot of books. Our class is small.We are up a path in a mobile. We can contact the old school on the intercom.Our mobile is in the middle of the field .The field is quite big with a stile up the top and a sandpit.We have slabs round our mobile.When it is sunny we go out.We have a barrel and water and bricks and cars.The playground is round the school it is very small.There's a pond round the back of school and a greenhouse. It has got all glass round it.We have flower beds all over the place down the path and all round the mobile. By Tom Bell and Hayley Forbes aged 6
